mapper.sql: ID, SALES_ID, NAME, GENDER, PHONE, EMAIL, WECHAT_ID, STREET, CITY, CAR_SELLING_STATE, FINANCE_STATE, LEASE_STATE, ZIP_CODE, UNIVERSITY, STATUS, RATING, POTENTIAL_BUYING_DATE, SERVICE, DELETE_FLAG, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PROFILE
order by
${listItem }
desc
asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT #{pk,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS PK
insert into PROFILE
ID,
SALES_ID,
NAME,
GENDER,

mapper.update:
update PROFILE
ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALES_ID = #{salesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WECHAT_ID = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STREET = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_SELLING_STATE = #{carSellingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINANCE_STATE = #{financeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEASE_STATE = #{leaseState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIVERSITY = #{university,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATING = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POTENTIAL_BUYING_DATE = #{potentialBuyingDate,jdbcType=DATE},
SERVICE = #{service,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETE_FLAG = ${deleteFlag}
